TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LambdaFilter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This applies the user provided RefPredicate to a column and drops rows that map to false. It automatically injects a standard conversion from the actual type of the source column to typeSrc (if needed).
